tvdb: Alison asks her mother why she was abandoned as a child and Elizabeth explains she chose her husband over her Ali.  Elizabeth asks Ali for a second chance.  Kate warns Ian about getting too close to Lucy, but he insists they're just friends.  However, he later blows Lucy off.  Jack tells Jamal about Tess, then takes him to the cave but when they don't find her, Jamal thinks Tess was a hallucination.  Lucy visits Livvie, who insists Jack, not Lucy, found and rescued her.  Livvie gets a chill when Tess walks by her room.  After Tess enters a comatose Brennan's room and pronounces him ""better,"" he moves his fingers.
